channel.title: Languages on David Raab
channel.description: Recent content in Languages on David Raab

item.title: Why I Hate Templating Languages
item.description: In the past I have worked a lot in web-development. This goes back to the early 2000 when web-sites was primarily just CGI scripts and didn’t used any JavaScript at all. Back then JavaScript also was mostly very slow as most Browser interpreted JavaScript. Back in that old times every click on a button, link and so on was a full request to the browser and a full new page has to be generated on the server side.
